name: Shapes Defence
description:
Welcome to Shapes Defence. This a very fun arcade game and a great timekiller.

In this game you have to shoot the shapes and prevent it to kill you. Its not that simple however , this game gets more crazy the more you play it

This game is in serious development and so a lot is to be added . This is a very early version of the game and it has a few bugs.

This is what the game contains right now

1.Battle 5 different types of shapes , each with their unique abilities                                        2.Play in two different modes ,Causal and Hextreme
